Violation Description.info: Include a detailed description of the violation. For example, gas drilling, drum dumping etc. If necessary, include specific directions.
Violation Description.answer: Illegal gas drilling activities by West Coast Energy Solutions, approximately 20 miles off the coast of San Diego, California. This has resulted in the destruction of essential habitats for various marine species, including endangered coral reefs, and an increase in water pollution due to the release of toxic chemicals and drilling waste. The matter has been reported to the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), who are currently investigating the situation and taking necessary actions to stop the illegal activities and mitigate the environmental damage caused.

Reporter Contact Information.info: You are not required to provide your contact information but the EPA might want to reach out to you for additional information.
